thread.title: FL governor vows to pass legislation to make schools safer

title: FL governor vows to pass legislation to make schools safer
text:
FL governor vows to pass legislation to make schools safer Tuesday, February 27, 2018 - 01:10 
Florida Governor Rick Scott vowed to 'work every day' to pass legislation that would keep students safe including investing in more officers on schools campuses and mental health resources. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
